steps.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
In a mixing bowl, combine 1 cup of flour, 1/2 cup of sugar, and 1/4 teaspoon of salt.
Add 1/2 cup of melted butter and mix until crumbly.
Press the mixture into the bottom of a greased baking dish.
Bake for 10 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown.
In a separate bowl, beat 2 eggs and 1 cup of sugar until well combined.
Add 1/4 cup of flour, 1/2 teaspoon of baking powder, and a pinch of salt to the egg mixture.
Stir in 1/2 cup of chopped nuts and 1/2 cup of chocolate chips.
Pour the mixture over the baked crust.
Bake for an additional 25-30 minutes, or until the top is set and golden brown.
